product_name: REI Midweight Polartec Power Dry Half Zip Top - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A warm, wicking base layer like the REI Midweight Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) Half Zip Top can make the difference between cold-weather trips to remember and those you'd like to forget. Polartec Power Dry utilizes 2 different yarns on either side of the fabric to enhance comfort: interior yarn wicks moisture, and exterior yarn dries quickly. Combination of the 2 yarns helps keep you dry during highly aerobic activities because it moves moisture away from skin faster than single-component fabrics such as cotton. 20 UPF sun protection. Center front zipper for ventilation. Soft, non-chafing flatseam construction; raglan shoulder seams are comfortable under pack straps. Underarm and side gussets promote freedom of motion. Longer length helps top stay tucked in; smooth outer fabric eases layering. The men's REI Midweight Polartec Power Dry Half Zip Top has a next-to-skin fit. Closeout.
